des: Have you ever heard the saying, "Timing is Everything?" Seers Hourly Forecast may help you discover the best time to engage your desired activity. These hourly time cycles have been used by the elite for thousands of years. The possessor of this secret knowledge will have a noticeable advantage over the skeptic and non-believer. According to the ancient wisdom keepers our current time cycle is based on the number seven. For example: There are 7 Emotional Seasons per Day, 7 Days makes 1 Week and 52 Weeks make 1 Year and 5 + 2 = 7. The 7 Emotional Seasons or Cycles are as followed: RELAX Time Cycle, PRODUCE (something) Time Cycle, PATIENCE (required) Time Cycle, ANALYSIS (deception) Time Cycle, CREATE (new project) Time Cycle, MONEY Time Cycle and SUCCESS Time Cycle.
